original_text: When a person sacrifices a friendship offering to the Lord, he must obey the rules. If he does, the Lord will accept the gift.
korean_text: 너희는 화목제물을 여호와께 드릴 때에 기쁘게 받으시도록 드리고

sentences.original_text: When a person sacrifices a friendship offering
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 우정의 제물을 드릴 때

sentences.original_text: the Lord will accept the gift
